channel.title: xkcd.com
channel.description: xkcd.com: A webcomic of romance and math humor.

img.title: Police reported three dozen cheerful bystanders, yet no one claims to have seen who did it.
img.alt: Police reported three dozen cheerful bystanders, yet no one claims to have seen who did it.

img.title: I'll concede ergonomics anecdotally, but none of the studies of Dvorak were at all rigorous (the most-cited Navy study was overseen by Dvorak himself). And the 'slow typists down' thing is a myth. Also EMACS RULES VI DROOLS WOOOOOOO!
img.alt: I'll concede ergonomics anecdotally, but none of the studies of Dvorak were at all rigorous (the most-cited Navy study was overseen by Dvorak himself). And the 'slow typists down' thing is a myth. Also EMACS RULES VI DROOLS WOOOOOOO!

img.title: I'm normally a pretty frugal person, but I still compulsively buy any R/C aircraft that's less than $30. In the last few years, this has become a problem.
img.alt: I'm normally a pretty frugal person, but I still compulsively buy any R/C aircraft that's less than $30. In the last few years, this has become a problem.

img.title: Like spelling 'dammit' correctly -- with two m's -- it's a troll that works best on the most literate.
img.alt: Like spelling 'dammit' correctly -- with two m's -- it's a troll that works best on the most literate.
